Once upon a time, in a distant land called Sweets and Treats, there lived a group of mischievous gummy bears who loved to play tricks on the other creatures in the land. One day, they decided to play a trick on the king and queen of Sweets and Treats.

Once upon a time, in a distant land called Sweets and Treats, there lived a group of friendly marshmallows who loved to make others happy with their sweetness. One day, they decided to go on a sweet quest to bring joy and happiness to the land.
Once upon a time in a distant land called Cookieville, there lived a group of mischievous cookies who loved to play tricks on anyone who crossed their path.
Once upon a time in a distant land called Chocolate World, there lived a beautiful chocolate fountain that flowed with rich and creamy chocolate.
Once upon a time in a distant land called Sugartown, there lived a friendly and bubbly group of gummies who loved to dance and play with everyone they met.
